categories: Category:Star Wars: Dark Times story arcs

nodes.text: Star Wars: Dark Times: Blue Harvest

Blue Harvest is the fourth arc in the Star Wars: Dark Times series of comics. It consists of five regular comic issues, as well as two special 8-page issues published by Myspace / Dark Horse Presents. The online issues are collected in the TPB and also reprinted in a special comic issue Dark Times: Blue Harvest 0 in the original black-and-white form. The title is inspired by the fake name George Lucas gave Episode Vl Return of the Jedi in 1983.

On Cato Neimoidia, former Jedi Dass Jennir accepts a job from the mysterious woman Ember Chankeli. She wants him to stop a gang that has taken over her town. Jennir travels to Telerath to accomplish this.
